definition.name: rust-tarpaulin
definition.description: Gather Rust code coverage information with Tarpaulin
definition.author: actions-rs team

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: The version of cargo-tarpaulin to install

inputs.name: args
inputs.description: Extra command line arguments passed to cargo-tarpaulin

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.description: The maximum time in seconds without a response from a test before timeout

inputs.name: run-types
inputs.description: The type of the coverage run [possible values: Tests, Doctests]

inputs.name: out-type
inputs.description: Output format of coverage report [possible values: Json, Toml, Stdout, Xml, Html, Lcov]

evidence.reasoning: The action is focused on gathering code coverage information, which is a key aspect of testing and assessing code quality in Rust projects.
